Title: Prohibits the sale of food and food products containing boneless lean beef trimmings, commonly referred to as "pink slime", in schools
Summary: Prohibits the sale of food and food products containing boneless lean beef trimmings, commonly referred to as "pink slime", in schools.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of food and food products containing boneless lean beef trimmings, commonly referred to as "pink slime", in schools
